buildCommand: . $HOME/.cargo/env && cargo install trunk && cd dashboard && trunk build --release
installCommand: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && . $HOME/.cargo/env && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown
ignoreCommand: git diff --quiet HEAD^ HEAD -- dashboard/ host/ guest/ wit/ vercel.json || exit 0
